Quest.Name: Make A Fighter Out of Me
By the Falls, For the Fallen

CustomBehavior.Text: You are a druid Class, means because shapeshift, next quest may have some issues.\n To avoid that bot will move to a special point and wait for mobs for the quest. Whit human assistance, just need like 1 minute to compelete this quest\n Tip: Just mount the Escaped Yak and bring him to Wash Station!!!

Need human interaction for nexts fights, no mesh for room
 TIP: 1) Fight 1- Move away from black thing
 TIP: 2) Fight 2- And from white bubbles
 TIP: 3) fight 3- And when he spins
 After all fights, turn-in/accept next quest move out and start bot

PickUp.QuestName: Make A Fighter Out of Me

TurnIn.QuestName: Make A Fighter Out of Me

CustomBehavior.Text:
Need human interaction for next fight, it's a never ending fight for bot, always have aggro
 TIP: 1)Kill 10 Amani BerserkerAggro one add (don't kill him) and move to the boss
 TIP: 2)Go Right side and use barrels till kill 5 Elites
 TIP: 3)Go left side and kill 3 Gurubashi Bloodrider
 Turn-in quest and start bot

CustomBehavior.Text: Need human interaction for next fight, Escort quest\n TIP: 1)Let bot look for caravan, then stop bot\n TIP: 2)Kill mobs and follow caravan till quest complete, then start bot
